item.title: Optimus Prime do Transformers 4 1.50 ETS2
item.description:
Optimus Prime do Transformers 4 1.50 ETS2

Novos detalhes e texturas 4K.
Cabine personalizada;
Cabine com realismo;
Opcional Fumaça no Escap;
Detalhes interno e externo;
Roda Original Optimus Prime.



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Bus G7 Scania Facelift 6×2 1.50 ETS2
item.description:
Bus G7 Scania Facelift 6×2 1.50 ETS2

LIGHTER MOD. Comes with installation file.
– 6 different steering wheel options.
– 3 6×2 chassis options: Mod plate or Original ETS 2 plate.
– Improved engines and physics.
– Automatic or manual transmission options.
– 103 Company Skins to choose from and 10 for you to edit in your own way.
– White cabin light ( Hint: Letter O turns the light on )

Passenger aisle LEDs: White, Orange and Blue.
– Now in the Skins when you choose, the glass is already adhered.
– 3 texture options for the seats, curtains and internal luggage compartment: Master Blue – Master Orange and Marajoara Green.
– Optional 2nd driver’s seat. – 3D made from scratch, rich in detail and lightweight.
– 2 Dashboard options: (on-board control)
– Optional internal rearview mirror.
– Optional exhaust.
– Realistic shadows.
– Several license plates to choose from: Euro, Mercosur and National.
– Functional pedals with animations: Brake and accelerator.
– Windshield wiper. 3 speeds.
– Dashboard with functional animations.
– Animations on the doors and windows.
– Optional 3D passengers inside the bus: with 3 seating options.
– Optional: when boarding, passengers remain seated; when disembarking, they leave the bus.

Translated with DeepL.com (free version)



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD
